Package game

Class Main

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.application.Application
      • game.Main
  • public class Main
extends javafx.application.Application
    The Main class that the game is run from

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  Main.serverGap
      This is the thread that runs the game server
      static class  Main.waitForGame
      This thread would be activated if the player is in some room and waiting for game starts If anyone pressed start, it would be detected and the thread would start the game
